actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the Cache La Poudre River Corridor Act to make technical amendments.
short_title: Cache la Poudre River Corridor Technical Amendments Act of 2001
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Cache La Poudre River Corridor Technical Amendments Act of 2001 - Amends the Cache La Poudre River Corridor Act with respect to the boundaries of the Cache La Poudre River Corridor in Colorado.Modifies requirements for the membership and terms of service of the Cache La Poudre Corridor Commission. Directs the Commission to administer the Corridor. (Currently, the Commission has only planning authority.)Extends the authorization of appropriations.

titles.title: Cache la Poudre River Corridor Technical Amendments Act of 2001
To amend the Cache La Poudre River Corridor Act to make technical amendments.
